analysis.key_quote: This is an absolutely absurd proposal. It will in no way increase efficiency in the way the government works but instead be detrimental to the services that the American people rely on.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by stating it is 'absurd' and detrimental to government services, indicating concerns about the impact on efficiency and the quality of services, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and politicization.
